name: Civil Rights Assertion
description: Document to assert your civil rights when facing potential discrimination or rights violations

sections.title: CIVIL RIGHTS ASSERTION
2. RIGHTS VIOLATION
sections.content: I am writing to formally assert my civil rights regarding an incident that occurred on {incident_date}. This letter serves as formal notice that I believe my rights under {rights_violated} have been violated.

sections.title: 3. INCIDENT DESCRIPTION
sections.content:
The details of the incident are as follows:

{incident_description}

sections.title: 4. WITNESS INFORMATION
sections.content:
The following individuals witnessed or have information about this incident:

{witness_information}

sections.title: 5. PREVIOUS COMPLAINTS
sections.content:
Previous attempts to address this issue include:

{previous_complaints}

sections.title: 6. LEGAL BASIS
sections.content:
My rights in this matter are protected by the following laws and regulations:

{legal_citations}

sections.title: 7. SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION
sections.content:
I have attached the following documentation to support my assertion:

{supporting_documents}

sections.title: 8. REQUESTED REMEDIES
sections.content:
To remedy this situation, I am requesting the following:

{requested_remedies}

sections.title: 9. RESPONSE REQUEST
sections.content: I request a written response to this letter by {response_deadline}. If I do not receive a satisfactory response by this date, I may pursue additional legal remedies, including filing a formal complaint with the appropriate government agency or seeking legal counsel.

sections.title: 10. CLOSING
